full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` YE SHES KYI MGON PO NAG PO CHEN PO DANG, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU GNYIS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL MYUR MDZAD DGONGS BSKYOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (DE LTAR MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I CHE BA RNAMS MGON PO NYID KYIS THUGS BSKYED TSUL DANG, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS RJE BLA MA DANG, GRUB CHEN MEE TRI PAS KHYUNG PO DANG, MGON PO NYID KYIS DPAL SHA WA RI PA LA GSUNGS PA RNAMS DANG, MGON DKAR GYI CHE BA KHYUNG PO'I SGRUB YIG SOGS SU BYUNG BA RNAMS TSIGS SU BCAD PAR BSDEBS PA'I YE SHES KYI MGON PO NAG PO CHEN PO DANG, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU GNYIS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL MYUR MDZAD DGONGS BSKYOD ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MYUR MDZAD THUGS RJE CAN 'DIS MTSAN PA'I @005A LHA SNGAGS KYI CHE BA JI LTAR MOD TSUL DPE LA LUS PA LAS YID DU 'JAGS PA MED PA RANG MYONG GIS GRUB PAS RKYEN BYAS, DAD PA'I GSOS 'DEBS SU RE BAS COL CHUNG ZHIG GIS BRIS PA STE, MYUR MDZAD THUGS RJE CAN GYIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUN GYUR CIG ,)
